mapper.select: SELECT T2.chat_room_id , T2.chat_room_type , T2.room_name , T2.last_message_preview , T2.last_message_at , T2.last_message_seq , T1.last_read_seq FROM chat_room_user T1 INNER JOIN chat_room T2 ON T1.chat_room_id = T2.chat_room_id WHERE T1.user_id = #{userId} AND T1.chat_room_user_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY T2.last_message_at DESC
